remarks: The inner product of a Hilbert space vector by itself is positive. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hlipgt0.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hlipgt0.5 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
hlipgt0.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
hlipgt0 $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ A e. X /\ A =/= Z ) -> 0 < ( A P A ) ) $.
